messages.title: A MANIFESTO FOR MEDWAY
messages.content: We love Medway. We think it is great as it is, but with a few UKIP changes, it can be even better. Here are our UKIP pledges to you.

messages.title: Vote for REAL change
messages.content: On 7th May you have TWO votes. Use them wisely and vote for REAL change, nationally and locally.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP will ensure our NHS stays public and free, cut management positions, abolish hospital car parking charges.
We will introduce 30 mins free parking in our town to help local shops.
We will work towards introducing an apprenticeship requirement for all large firms.
We will cut our councilor allowances by 20% over the next four years.
We will work to sort out 'The Strood' traffic issues, returning calls for residents' recommendations every Monday.
We will introduce a zero tolerance policy for littering, dog fouling, cycling on pavements and spitting.
We will work with and support local businesses and youth job markets, providing training opportunities.
We will put local people first and focus on regenerating brownfield sites and urban renewal programs, opposed to invasion of green spaces.
Our children deserve the best start in life. We will seek to expand university technical colleges and academies.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Regenerate our High Street in Medway
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will support our high streets by dropping Medway Council's Rochester Airport Masterplan, to stop a shopping estate on our historic streets.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Both the Labour and Conservative candidates against their thinking that being an MP is a full-time job.

issues.education: Our children deserve the best start in life. We will seek to expand university technical colleges and academies.
issues.environment: We will work towards introducing an apprenticeship requirement for all large firms, put local people first and focus on regenerating brownfield sites and urban renewal programs.
issues.health: UKIP will ensure our NHS stays public and free, cut management positions, abolish hospital car parking charges.
issues.immigration: Control our borders Only UKIP will give us an Australian-style points based immigration system.

housing.content: We will put local people first and focus on regenerating brownfield sites and urban renewal programs, opposed to invasion of green spaces.

contactInformation.address: UKIP Shop, 30 High Street, Rochester ME1 1LP

quotes.text: A VOTE for UKIP, is a vote for yourself.

images.caption: Mark Reckless - Working hard for Rochester and Strood
